name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swordsman of the Azure Blade Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing with the elegance of the Swordsman of the Azure Blade.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension transforms your new tab into a stunning live wallpaper, reflecting the serene strength and precision of the azure swordsman.

Why Download?

Explore more live wallpapers featuring iconic characters and scenes like Rurouni Kenshin, Sekiro, and Samurai Champloo!
